titleStmt.title: Wolfgang Waidner / Worms AN Heinrich Bullinger / Zürich, 13. April 1560

msItem.incipit: Literas quas scripsi ad humanitates vestras interea die proxime elapsi Decembris non dubito quin ad vos pervenerint

date.note: * Eingereiht bei Waidner an HB + Gwalther, Worms 12. Sept. 1560 (= ID 4451)

div.p:
Literas, quas scripsi, ad humanitates nostras, incorta die proxime Elapsi, decembris non dubito.
